article_title: India's cattle farmers have beef with PM Modi
article_text: A ban on the sale of cattle for slaughter in India could send millions of farmers into poverty. It's a knock-on effect of the right-wing push from Prime Minister Narendra Modi's ruling BJP party, aiming to put greater emphasis on Hindu values, including keeping cows sacred.

article_metadata.sailthru.title: India's cattle farmers have beef with PM Modi

article_summary:
A ban on the sale of cattle for slaughter in India could send millions of farmers into poverty.
It's a knock-on effect of the right-wing push from Prime Minister Narendra Modi's ruling BJP party, aiming to put greater emphasis on Hindu values, including keeping cows sacred.
